verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1859>Feast<s%> of <S%G106>Unleavened<s%> Bread, which is <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover,<s%> was <S%G1448>approaching.<s%>

And the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> were <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they might <S%G337>put<s%> Him to <S%G337>death;<s%> for they were <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

And <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> into <S%G2455>Judas<s%> who was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G1510>belonging<s%> <S%G1537><s%> to the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve.<s%>
And he <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> and <S%G4814>discussed<s%> with the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G4755>officers<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he might <S%G3860>betray<s%> Him to them.
And they were <S%G5463>glad,<s%> and <S%G4934>agreed<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> him <S%G694>money.<s%>
And he <S%G1843>consented,<s%> and [began] <S%G2212>seeking<s%> a <S%G2120>good<s%> <S%G2120>opportunity<s%> to <S%G3860>betray<s%> Him to them <S%G817>apart<s%> from the <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> the [first] <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G106>Unleavened<s%> Bread on <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> [lamb] <S%G1163>had<s%> to be <S%G2380>sacrificed.<s%>
And He <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4198>"Go<s%> and <S%G2090>prepare<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> for us, that we may <S%G2068>eat<s%> it."
And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4226>"Where<s%> do You <S%G2309>want<s%> us to <S%G2090>prepare<s%> it?"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> when you have <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> will <S%G4876>meet<s%> you <S%G941>carrying<s%> a <S%G2765>pitcher<s%> of <S%G5204>water;<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> him into the <S%G3614>house<s%> that he <S%G1531>enters.<s%>

"And you shall <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G3617>owner<s%> of the <S%G3614>house,<s%> 'The <S%G1320>Teacher<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to you, <S%G4226>"Where<s%> is the <S%G2646>guest<s%> <S%G2646>room<s%> in <S%G3699>which<s%> I may <S%G2068>eat<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> with My <S%G3101>disciples<s%>? "'
" And he will <S%G1166>show<s%> you a <S%G3173>large,<s%> <S%G4766>furnished,<s%> <S%G7012>upper<s%> <S%G7012>room;<s%> <S%G2090>prepare<s%> it <S%G1563>there.<s%>"
And they <S%G565>departed<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> [everything] <S%G2531>just<s%> as He had <S%G3004>told<s%> them; and they <S%G2090>prepared<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover.<s%>
And <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> had <S%G1096>come<s%> He <S%G377>reclined<s%> [at the table,] and the <S%G652>apostles<s%> with Him.
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I have <S%G1939>earnestly<s%> <S%G1937>desired<s%> to <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3957>Passover<s%> with you <S%G4253>before<s%> I <S%G3958>suffer;<s%>

for I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I shall <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3765>again<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> it <S%G2193>until<s%> it is <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> "

And when He had <S%G1209>taken<s%> a <S%G4221>cup<s%> [and] <S%G2168>given<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2983>"Take<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> and <S%G1266>share<s%> it <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves;<s%>

for I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, I will not <S%G4095>drink<s%> of the <S%G7032>fruit<s%> of the <S%G288>vine<s%> from <S%G3568>now<s%> on <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2064>comes.<s%> "

And when He had <S%G2983>taken<s%> [some] <S%G740>bread<s%> [and] <S%G2168>given<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> He <S%G2806>broke<s%> [it,] and <S%G1325>gave<s%> [it] to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> is My <S%G4983>body<s%> which is <S%G1325>given<s%> for you; <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> in <S%G364>remembrance<s%> of Me."

And in the <S%G5615>same<s%> <S%G5615>way<s%> [He took] the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> they had <S%G1172>eaten,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> which is <S%G7062>poured<s%> out for you is the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%> in My <S%G129>blood.<s%>
" But <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the one <S%G3860>betraying<s%> Me is with Me on the <S%G5132>table.<s%>

"For <S%G3303>indeed,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G4198>going<s%> as it <S%G2192>has<s%> been <S%G3724>determined;<s%> but <S%G3759>woe<s%> to that <S%G444>man<s%> by <S%G3739>whom<s%> He is <S%G3860>betrayed!<s%>"

And they <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G4802>discuss<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> one of them it might be who was <S%G3195>going<s%> to <S%G4238>do<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>thing.<s%>
And there <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G5379>dispute<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them [as to] <S%G5101>which<s%> one of them was <S%G1380>regarded<s%> to be <S%G3173>greatest.<s%>

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "The <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2961>lord<s%> it <S%G2961>over<s%> them; and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1850>have<s%> <S%G1850>authority<s%> <S%G1850>over<s%> them are <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2110>'Benefactors.<s%>'

"But not <S%G3779>so<s%> with you, but let him who is the <S%G3173>greatest<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you <S%G1096>become<s%> as the <S%G3501>youngest,<s%> and the <S%G2233>leader<s%> as the <S%G1247>servant.<s%>

"For <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G3173>greater,<s%> the one who <S%G345>reclines<s%> [at the table,] <S%G2228>or<s%> the one who <S%G1247>serves<s%>? Is it not the one who <S%G345>reclines<s%> [at the table]? But I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3319><s%> you as the one who <S%G1247>serves.<s%>
"And you are <S%G3588>those<s%> who have <S%G1265>stood<s%> by Me in My <S%G3986>trials;<s%>
and <S%G2531>just<s%> as My <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1303>granted<s%> Me a <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> I <S%G1303>grant<s%> you

that you may <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink<s%> at My <S%G5132>table<s%> in My <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and you will <S%G2521>sit<s%> on <S%G2362>thrones<s%> <S%G2919>judging<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>
<S%G4613>"Simon,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1809>demanded<s%> [permission] to <S%G4617>sift<s%> you <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G4621>wheat;<s%>

but I have <S%G1189>prayed<s%> for you, that your <S%G4102>faith<s%> may not <S%G1587>fail;<s%> and you, <S%G4218>when<s%> <S%G4218>once<s%> you have <S%G1994>turned<s%> <S%G1994>again,<s%> <S%G4741>strengthen<s%> your <S%G80>brothers.<s%> "
And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> with You I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G5438>prison<s%> and to <S%G2288>death!<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> the <S%G220>cock<s%> will not <S%G5455>crow<s%> <S%G4594>today<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> you have <S%G533>denied<s%> <S%G5151>three<s%> <S%G5151>times<s%> that you <S%G3609>know<s%> Me."

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3753>"When<s%> I <S%G649>sent<s%> you out <S%G817>without<s%> <S%G905>purse<s%> and <S%G4082>bag<s%> and <S%G5266>sandals,<s%> you did not <S%G5302>lack<s%> <S%G5100>anything,<s%> did you?" And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> "[No,] <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "But <S%G3568>now,<s%> let him who <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G905>purse<s%> <S%G142>take<s%> it along, <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G4082>bag,<s%> and let him who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3162>sword<s%> <S%G4453>sell<s%> his <S%G2440>robe<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> one.

"For I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, that <S%G3778>this<s%> which is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G5055>fulfilled<s%> in Me, 'And He was <S%G3049>numbered<s%> with <S%G459>transgressors';<s%> for that which <S%G4012>refers<s%> to Me <S%G2192>has<s%> [its] <S%G5056>fulfillment."<s%>
And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G2400>look,<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> are <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3162>swords.<s%>" And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "It is <S%G2425>enough.<s%>"

And He <S%G1831>came<s%> out and <S%G4198>proceeded<s%> as was His <S%G1485>custom<s%> to the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives;<s%> and the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.
And when He <S%G1096>arrived<s%> at the <S%G5117>place,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4336>"Pray<s%> that you may not <S%G1525>enter<s%> into <S%G3986>temptation.<s%>"
And He <S%G645>withdrew<s%> from them <S%G5616>about<s%> a stone's <S%G1000>throw,<s%> and He <S%G1119>knelt<s%> <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5087>down<s%> <S%G1119><s%> and [began] to <S%G4336>pray,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3962>"Father,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> Thou art <S%G1014>willing,<s%> <S%G3911>remove<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> from Me; <S%G4133>yet<s%> not My <S%G2307>will,<s%> but <S%G4674>Thine<s%> be <S%G1096>done.<s%>"
<S%G1161>Now<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3708>appeared<s%> to Him, <S%G1765>strengthening<s%> Him.

And <S%G1096>being<s%> in <S%G74>agony<s%> He was <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G1617>very<s%> <S%G1619>fervently;<s%> and His <S%G2402>sweat<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> <S%G2361>drops<s%> of <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G2597>falling<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> upon the <S%G1093>ground.<s%>
And when He <S%G450>rose<s%> from <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> them <S%G2837>sleeping<s%> from <S%G3077>sorrow,<s%>
and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are you <S%G2518>sleeping<s%>? <S%G450>Rise<s%> and <S%G4336>pray<s%> that you may not <S%G1525>enter<s%> into <S%G3986>temptation.<s%>"

While He was <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2980>speaking,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G3793>multitude<s%> [came,] and the one <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> was <S%G4281>preceding<s%> them; and he <S%G1448>approached<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G5368>kiss<s%> Him.
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2455>"Judas,<s%> are you <S%G3860>betraying<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> with a <S%G5370>kiss<s%>?"

And when <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> were <S%G4012>around<s%> Him <S%G3708>saw<s%> what was going to <S%G1510>happen,<s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> shall we <S%G3960>strike<s%> with the <S%G3162>sword<s%>?"

And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them <S%G3960>struck<s%> the <S%G1401>slave<s%> of the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> and <S%G851>cut<s%> <S%G851>off<s%> his <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G3775>ear.<s%>

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1439>"Stop!<s%> <S%G2193>No<s%> <S%G2193>more<s%> of <S%G3778>this.<s%>" And He <S%G681>touched<s%> his <S%G5621>ear<s%> and <S%G2390>healed<s%> him.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and <S%G4755>officers<s%> of the <S%G2413>temple<s%> and <S%G4245>elders<s%> who had <S%G3854>come<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> Him, "Have you <S%G1831>come<s%> out with <S%G3162>swords<s%> and <S%G3586>clubs<s%> as <S%G1909>against<s%> a <S%G3027>robber<s%>?

"While I was with you <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G2250><s%> in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> you did not <S%G1614>lay<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> on Me; but <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> and the <S%G1849>power<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%> are <S%G4771>yours.<s%>"

And having <S%G4815>arrested<s%> Him, they <S%G71>led<s%> Him [away,] and <S%G1521>brought<s%> Him to the <S%G3614>house<s%> of the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest;<s%> but <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G190>following<s%> at a <S%G3113>distance.<s%>

And after they had <S%G4015>kindled<s%> a <S%G4442>fire<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of the <S%G833>courtyard<s%> and had <S%G4776>sat<s%> <S%G4776>down<s%> <S%G4776>together,<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> them.

And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> servant-girl, <S%G3708>seeing<s%> him as he <S%G2521>sat<s%> in the <S%G5457>firelight,<s%> and <S%G816>looking<s%> <S%G816>intently<s%> at him, <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> was with Him <S%G2532>too.<s%>"
But he <S%G720>denied<s%> [it,] <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> I do not <S%G3609>know<s%> Him."

And a <S%G1024>little<s%> <S%G3326>later,<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> him and <S%G5346>said,<s%> "You are [one] of them <S%G2532>too!<s%>" But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G444>"Man,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not!"

And after <S%G5616>about<s%> an <S%G5610>hour<s%> had <S%G1339>passed,<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G243>man<s%> [began] to <S%G1340>insist,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1909>"Certainly<s%> <S%G225><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was with Him, for he is a <S%G1057>Galilean<s%> <S%G2532>too.<s%>"

But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G444>"Man,<s%> I do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you are <S%G3004>talking<s%> about." And <S%G3916>immediately,<s%> while he was <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2980>speaking,<s%> a <S%G220>cock<s%> <S%G5455>crowed.<s%>

And the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4762>turned<s%> and <S%G1689>looked<s%> at <S%G4074>Peter.<s%> And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G5279>remembered<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> He had <S%G3004>told<s%> him, <S%G4250>"Before<s%> a <S%G220>cock<s%> <S%G5455>crows<s%> <S%G4594>today,<s%> you will <S%G533>deny<s%> Me <S%G5151>three<s%> <S%G5151>times.<s%>"
And he <S%G1831>went<s%> out and <S%G2799>wept<s%> <S%G4090>bitterly.<s%>
And the <S%G435>men<s%> who were <S%G4912>holding<s%> Jesus in <S%G4912>custody<s%> were <S%G1702>mocking<s%> Him, and <S%G1194>beating<s%> Him,
and they <S%G4028>blindfolded<s%> Him and were <S%G1905>asking<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4395>"Prophesy,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is the one who <S%G3817>hit<s%> You?"
And they were <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G4183>things<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> Him, <S%G987>blaspheming.<s%>
